title: Creepypasta Reader
description:
So there are a lot of other creepypasta reader app, why should you (at least) try this one:
- Always updated! Unlike the existing apps, this one uses the official creepypasta.com's,.org's, r/nosleep, and creepypasta wikia's databases and pasta list.
- Offline Mode. You can save stories and read them while you're offline(You should be online while saving).
New Features:
- Community Pastas section - you may now submit your own pasta and read pastas written by other users!
- You may now create your own profile!
description_html:
So there are a lot of other creepypasta reader app, why should you (at least) try this one:
- Always updated! Unlike the existing apps, this one uses the official creepypasta.com's,.org's, r/nosleep, and creepypasta wikia's databases and pasta list.
- Offline Mode. You can save stories and read them while you're offline(You should be online while saving).

New Features:
- Community Pastas section - you may now submit your own pasta and read pastas written by other users!
- You may now create your own profile!
